Title: A Gang Story
Writer: Olivier Marchal (scenario), Edgar Marie (scenario), Olivier Marchal (adaptation), Edmond Vidal (book), Edgar Marie (book)
Actors: Gérard Lanvin, Tchéky Karyo, Daniel Duval, Lionnel Astier
Plot: After growing up in a poor gypsy camp, Edmond Vidal, aka Momon, has retained a sense of family, unfailing loyalty and pride in his origins. Most of all, he has remained friends with Serge ...
